title: play with riot?
body:
is riot staff still going to host some weekend matches/did they keep doing it?

I played  in one I think (can't remember) and had a good time spectating it.

im just not really sure if the staff were doing that as a one time thing or if you would keep it up?

ps: I haven't actually been on in quite a while so I don't know any of the news on this if anything's changed, sorry about that
